scenario_text.value: (Where am I? It’s too dark to see anything.)

(How am I able to stand now? Which way is up?
Which way is down?)

(What is this? It’s like it’s bubbling up
from beneath the ground. That awful voice.)

(What?! Something dark and big is headed this
way?!)

Power, knowledge... Existence, soul, heart...
Bring them all...to me!

(What is that strange warm light? And I know
I’ve heard that voice before...)
(Let’s see. Where’s the light coming from...)
